scripts.start-windows: cd ..\Frontend && npm run build && cd ..\Backend && (if exist public rmdir /s /q public) && mkdir ..\Backend\public && move ..\Frontend\dist\*.* ..\Backend\public && move ..\Frontend\dist\assets ..\Backend\public && cd ..\Backend && pm2 start index.js
scripts.start-linux: cd ../Frontend && npm run build && rm -rf ../Backend/public && mkdir -p ../Backend/public && mv ../Frontend/dist/* ../Backend/public && cd ../Backend && pm2 start index.js
